00048 template< typename T > class Cap;
00049 
00066 class Cap_base
00067 {
00068 private:
00069   struct Invalid_conversion;
00070 
00071 public:
00072   enum No_init_type
00073   {
00077      No_init
00078   };
00079 
00083   enum Cap_type
00084   {
00085     Invalid = L4_INVALID_CAP 
00086   };
00087 
00092   l4_cap_idx_t cap() const throw() { return _c; }
00093 
00100   bool is_valid() const throw() { return !(_c & L4_INVALID_CAP_BIT); }
00101 
00102   operator Invalid_conversion * () const throw()
00103   { return (Invalid_conversion*)(!(_c & L4_INVALID_CAP_BIT)); }
00104 
00110   l4_fpage_t fpage(unsigned rights = L4_FPAGE_RWX) const throw()
00111   { return l4_obj_fpage(_c, 0, rights); }
00112 
00119   l4_umword_t snd_base(unsigned grant = 0,
00120                        l4_cap_idx_t base = L4_INVALID_CAP) const throw()
00121   {
00122     if (base == L4_INVALID_CAP)
00123       base = _c;
00124     return l4_map_obj_control(base, grant);
00125   }
00126 
00127 
00131   bool operator == (Cap_base const &o) const throw()
00132   { return _c == o._c; }
00133 
00137   bool operator != (Cap_base const &o) const throw()
00138   { return _c != o._c; }
00139 
00146   inline l4_msgtag_t validate(l4_utcb_t *u = l4_utcb()) const throw();
00147 
00156   inline l4_msgtag_t validate(Cap<Task> task,
00157                               l4_utcb_t *u = l4_utcb()) const throw();
00158 
00162   void invalidate() throw() { _c = L4_INVALID_CAP; }
00163 protected:
00168   explicit Cap_base(l4_cap_idx_t c) throw() : _c(c) {}
00172   explicit Cap_base(Cap_type cap) throw() : _c(cap) {}
00173 
00178   explicit Cap_base(l4_default_caps_t cap) throw() : _c(cap) {}
00179 
00183   explicit Cap_base() throw() {}
00184 
00187   l4_cap_idx_t _c;
00188 };
00189 
00190 
00199 template< typename T >
00200 class Cap : public Cap_base
00201 {
00202 private:
00203   friend class L4::Kobject;
00204 
00215   explicit Cap(T const *p) throw()
00216   : Cap_base(reinterpret_cast<l4_cap_idx_t>(p)) {}
00217 
00218 public:
00219 
00224   template< typename O >
00225   Cap(Cap<O> const &o) throw() : Cap_base(o.cap())
00226   { register T* __t = ((O*)100); (void)__t; }
00227 
00231   Cap(Cap_type cap) throw() : Cap_base(cap) {}
00232 
00237   Cap(l4_default_caps_t cap) throw() : Cap_base(cap) {}
00238 
00243   explicit Cap(l4_cap_idx_t idx = L4_INVALID_CAP) throw() : Cap_base(idx) {}
00244 
00248   explicit Cap(No_init_type) throw() {}
00249 
00256   Cap move(Cap const &src) const
00257   {
00258     if (!is_valid() || !src.is_valid())
00259       return *this;
00260 
00261     l4_task_map(L4_BASE_TASK_CAP, L4_BASE_TASK_CAP, src.fpage(L4_FPAGE_RWX),
00262                 snd_base(L4_MAP_ITEM_GRANT));
00263 
00264     return *this;
00265   }
00266 
00270   T *operator -> () const throw() { return reinterpret_cast<T*>(_c); }
00271 };
00272 
00273 
00278 template<>
00279 class Cap<void> : public Cap_base
00280 {
00281 public:
00282 
00283   explicit Cap(void const *p) throw()
00284   : Cap_base(reinterpret_cast<l4_cap_idx_t>(p)) {}
00285 
00289   Cap(Cap_type cap) throw() : Cap_base(cap) {}
00290 
00295   Cap(l4_default_caps_t cap) throw() : Cap_base(cap) {}
00296 
00301   explicit Cap(l4_cap_idx_t idx = L4_INVALID_CAP) throw() : Cap_base(idx) {}
00302   explicit Cap(No_init_type) throw() {}
00303 
00310   Cap move(Cap const &src) const
00311   {
00312     if (!is_valid() || !src.is_valid())
00313       return *this;
00314 
00315     l4_task_map(L4_BASE_TASK_CAP, L4_BASE_TASK_CAP, src.fpage(L4_FPAGE_RWX),
00316                 snd_base(L4_MAP_ITEM_GRANT));
00317 
00318     return *this;
00319   }
00320 
00321   template< typename T >
00322   Cap(Cap<T> const &o) throw() : Cap_base(o.cap()) {}
00323 };
00324 
00342 template< typename T, typename F >
00343 inline
00344 Cap<T> cap_cast(Cap<F> const &c) throw()
00345 {
00346   (void)static_cast<T const *>(reinterpret_cast<F const *>(100));
00347   return Cap<T>(c.cap());
00348 }
00349 
00366 template< typename T, typename F >
00367 inline
00368 Cap<T> cap_reinterpret_cast(Cap<F> const &c) throw()
00369 {
00370   return Cap<T>(c.cap());
00371 }
00372 
00397 #define L4_DISABLE_COPY(_class)         \
00398   private:                              \
00399     _class(_class const &);             \
00400     _class operator = (_class const &);
00401 
00402 
00416 #define L4_KOBJECT_DISABLE_COPY(_class) \
00417   protected:                            \
00418     _class();                           \
00419   L4_DISABLE_COPY(_class)
00420 
00421 
00438 #define L4_KOBJECT(_class) L4_KOBJECT_DISABLE_COPY(_class)
00439 
00440 
00452 class Kobject
00453 {
00454   L4_KOBJECT(Kobject)
00455 
00456 private:
00457 
00458   template<typename T>
00459   friend Type_info const *kobject_typeid();
00460 
00461 protected:
00469   struct __Kobject_typeid { static Type_info const _m; };
00470 
00478   l4_cap_idx_t cap() const throw() { return _c(); }
00479 
00480 private:
00481 
00486   l4_cap_idx_t _c() const throw()
00487   { return reinterpret_cast<l4_cap_idx_t>(this) & L4_CAP_MASK; }
00488 
00489 public:
00503   l4_msgtag_t dec_refcnt(l4_mword_t diff, l4_utcb_t *utcb = l4_utcb())
00504   { return l4_kobject_dec_refcnt_u(cap(), diff, utcb); }
00505 };
00506 
00509 inline l4_msgtag_t
00510 Cap_base::validate(Cap<Task> task, l4_utcb_t *u) const throw()
00511 { return l4_task_cap_valid_u(task.cap(), _c, u);  }
00512 
00513 inline l4_msgtag_t
00514 Cap_base::validate(l4_utcb_t *u) const throw()
00515 { return l4_task_cap_valid_u(L4_BASE_TASK_CAP, _c, u);  }
00516 
00517 }; // namespace L4

00519 #include <l4/sys/meta>

00521 namespace L4 {
00522 
00546 template< typename T, typename F >
00547 inline
00548 Cap<T> cap_dynamic_cast(Cap<F> const &c) throw()
00549 {
00550   if (!c.is_valid())
00551     return Cap<T>::Invalid;
00552 
00553   Cap<Meta> mc = cap_reinterpret_cast<Meta>(c);
00554   Type_info const *m = kobject_typeid<T>();
00555   if (m->proto() && l4_error(mc->supports(m->proto())) > 0)
00556     return Cap<T>(c.cap());
00557 
00558   // FIXME: use generic checker
00559 #if 0
00560   if (l4_error(mc->supports(T::kobject_proto())) > 0)
00561     return Cap<T>(c.cap());
00562 #endif
00563 
00564   return Cap<T>::Invalid;
00565 }
00566 
00568 }
